bike.description: P. Series A1 Premium Aluminum, fully-butted ORE DT, forged HT/ISCG BB/chainstay yoke/horizontal dropouts w/ replaceable der hanger & SS axle carriers, integrated chain tensioner

components.description: Integrated FSA Impact, 1-1/8" x 1-1/2" threadless, Campy type full cartridge bearings
Alloy two bolt, no offset, micro adjust, 30.9mm
post, collar, single and multispeed hardware, owners manual
